tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medication_tracking (
    medication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    dosage FLOAT NOT NULL,
    usage_frequency INTEGER,
    effectiveness_rating INTEGER,
    notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  dosage INT,
  frequency VARCHAR(50),
  effectiveness VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE medication_usage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_id INT,
  dosage_taken INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    dosage INT NOT NULL,
    frequency INT NOT NULL,
    effectiveness_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    weight FLOAT,
    height FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Medication_Usage (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(id),
    medication_id INT REFERENCES Medications(id),
    dosage_taken INT NOT NULL,
    date_taken DATE NOT NULL,
    time_taken TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    dosage INT,
    frequency STRING,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    address STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Symptoms (
    symptom_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    symptom_name STRING,
    severity INT,
    date_reported DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentResults (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID,
    medication_id UUID,
    treatment_outcome STRING,
    effectiveness_rating INT,
    follow_up_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosage DECIMAL(5,2),
    frequency VARCHAR(20),
    side_effects VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_id INT,
    prescribed_date DATE,
    dosage_instructions VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    prescription_id INT,
    treatment_date DATE,
    effectiveness_score INT,
    comments VARCHAR(200),
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(prescription_id) REFERENCES prescriptions(prescription_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    recommended_medication_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(recommended_medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id)
);
